title: Update hero copy: change “the banter” to “banter”

requirements.text: Update the landing page hero description copy to remove the word “the” from the phrase “the banter”, so it reads “banter” (e.g., change “and the banter you won't bloody forget!” to “and banter you won't bloody forget!”).

quotes: remove the "the" from "the banter" so it just reads "banter"

acceptanceCriteria: In the Hero section description text, the phrase “the banter” no longer appears.
The hero description sentence reads with “banter” (without “the”) and is otherwise unchanged.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: No other copy changes across the site beyond removing “the” from “the banter”.
